TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITypeResolutionService

Docs.summary: Provides an interface to retrieve an assembly or type by name.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This service is used to load types at design time.
## Examples The following example control provides an interface to call methods of the ITypeResolutionService from design mode.
[!code-cs[ITypeResolutionServiceExample#1](~/add/codesnippet/CSharp/t-system.componentmodel._143_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[ITypeResolutionServiceExample#1](~/add/codesnippet/CPP/t-system.componentmodel._143_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[ITypeResolutionServiceExample#1](~/add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/t-system.componentmodel._143_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Reflection.Assembly GetAssembly(class System.Reflection.AssemblyName name) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the assembly to retrieve.

if this method should throw an exception if the assembly cannot be located; otherwise, , and this method returns if the assembly cannot be located.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetPathOfAssembly(class System.Reflection.AssemblyName name) cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the path to the file from which the assembly was loaded.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Type GetType(string name) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the type. If the type name is not a fully qualified name that indicates an assembly, this service will search its internal set of referenced assemblies.
Docs.summary: Loads a type with the specified name.

MemberSignature.Value: public Type GetType (string name, bool throwOnError);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Type GetType(string name, bool throwOnError) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the type. If the type name is not a fully qualified name that indicates an assembly, this service will search its internal set of referenced assemblies.
if this method should throw an exception if the assembly cannot be located; otherwise, , and this method returns if the assembly cannot be located.
Docs.summary: Loads a type with the specified name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the type cannot be loaded and the `throwOnError` parameter is `true`, this will throw an exception.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ReferenceAssembly(class System.Reflection.AssemblyName name) cil managed

Docs.param: An <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName> that indicates the assembly to reference.
Docs.summary: Adds a reference to the specified assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Once a reference to an assembly has been added to this service, this service can load types from names that do not specify an assembly.
